name: Copy of J.A.R.V.I.S. Absolute Mode Assistant
description: A sophisticated AI assistant powered by Google Gemini, operating in J.A.R.V.I.S. Absolute Mode. It provides real-time voice interactions, image generation and editing, advanced content analysis, up-to-date information retrieval via Google Search and Maps, and comprehensive audio utilities, all delivered with logical precision and a formal demeanor.
